channel.title: Trophy Dark Incursion: Cold War
channel.description:
This is a long shot but I thought I'd ask - I found on itch.io some time ago a series of three Trophy Dark Incursions that took place in the post-WWII cold war period. I made the mistake of not buying them at the time and now I can't find them.
Does anyone else know what I'm on about?
Maybe it was a fever dream ...

item.title: Trophy Dark Incursion: Cold War
item.dc:creator: @sarcastic
item.description:
@sarcastic wrote:

Okay, it wasn’t a fever dream. It’s just user error on itch.io’s search function. The games come from Monkey’s Paw Games and are titled “The Flash” and “3/10/1956”

Read full topic
